attributes.action: False allegation of Jeremy Corbyn by the Sun newspaper
attributes.additional_details: Jeremy can clearly be seen in other media outlets at that exact moment walking with the Veteran.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn was reported to have been dancing his way to the Cenotaph on Remembrance Sunday. The Sun paper, photo shopped a WWII Veteran out of the picture. This made it look like Jeremy Corbyn was mocking the Service.

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
